Title: getting dizzy
Description: you must turn around 20 times in spawn before the round starts. after every kill, you must turn around 10 more times.

Title: mission impossible
Description: you must play the mission impossible theme song on 100% volume, and only use ghost the entire round

Title: team spirit
Description: you have to constantly compliment EVERYTHING that your teammates do

Title: throwing my elo
Description: if you die, you have to spend the rest of the round blaming your teammates.

Title: flicked on
Description: you have to triple your sensitivity the entire round and only use a marshal

Title: my ace
Description: you have to choose one player to be your dedicated pro player. the rest of the team must act as bait and do everything they can to allow the chosen one to ace.

Title: let's rotate
Description: if you get one kill while pushing a site, you must immediately rotate to another site. you may only plant if there is no players on site.

Title: assassin
Description: you can only kill the enemies if they are facing away from you

Title: cracked
Description: you must prefire EVERYTHING for the entire round

Title: sharing is caring
Description: only one gun can be bought for the entire team. you can pick up the gun if the user dies.

Title: i got my one
Description: once you get a kill, you must run back to spawn (you can play again if everyone else dies)

Title: respawn?
Description: your primary objective should be to get to the enemy team spawn. once you have reached their spawn, you can play the round as normal.

Title: it's the meta
Description: you cannot stand still while you shoot for the entire round. shotguns not allowed.

Title: throwing
Description: nominate two players to throw the round. they must do everything in their power to stop the other three from getting kills.

Title: bored of waiting
Description: if you die, you must watch tiktok/youtube on full volume on your phone

Title: nerd
Description: you must start every sentence with fun fact for the whole round

Title: press f to pay respects
Description: if a teammate dies, everyone must stop shooting for 10 seconds and mourn their loss.

Title: feeling cheeky
Description: everything you say for the entire round must be sus asf. even while making call-outs/talking to teammates.

Title: bo'oh' o wo'ah
Description: put on your worst british accent for the entire round

Title: iron cosplay
Description: turn on inverted mouse in your settings and attempt to kill

Title: planet of the apes
Description: you must only use shotgun for the entire round, and communicate in monkey noises

Title: feeling sleepy
Description: you must play on 1/4 of your normal sensitivity for the whole round

Title: bounty hunters
Description: you must nominate one player on the enemy team to be your target. you cannot shoot the other players until your target is dead.

Title: men
Description: if you are dead, you must backseat and mansplain valorant to the person you are spectating

Title: my keyboard broke
Description: you must hold the d key for the entire round no matter what

Title: can't find my glasses
Description: you have to aim down sight the entire round

Title: firing squad
Description: everyone must buy an operator or marshal and move together as a group

Title: spray 'n pray
Description: whenever you fire your gun, you must keep firing until your clip runs out

Title: back it up
Description: you can only move by holding the 'S' key. No 'A', 'D', Or 'W' allowed

Title: hit list
Description: you must kill the enemy team in the order of their leaderboard, from highest to lowest.

Title: one shot one kill
Description: you must empty your guns before the round starts, leave only five bullets TOTAL. one for each enemy ??

Title: run 'n gun
Description: buy spectres (or frenzy's if you're broke). Once the round starts don't stop sprinting. Not even to plant spike!
